name: AmbientSoundsMusicforDeepRelaxation
0:
”Alexa, launch Ambient Soundscapes”
”Alexa, ask Ambient Soundscapes to play ocean waves”
”Alexa, ask Ambient Soundscapes to play Thunderstorm”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambient soundscapes
des:
"Ambient Sounds : Music for Deep Relaxation" skill helps you improve memory, focus and concentration. It helps you sleep peacefully or block out unwanted noise at work or home. You'll be able to sleep better, stay focused, relax quickly and more effectively. 

Here are carefully picked Ambient Soundscapes:
- Rainforest
- Ocean waves
- Thunderstorm
- Ceramic wind chimes
- Metal wind chimes
- Approaching storm
- Singing bowl
- Magic forest
- Airport lounge
- Bird chirping
- Babbling brook
- Wind noise
- Tawny owl
- Cicadas noise
- Cricket sounds
- Water dripping
- Wood thrush
- Zen stone
- Rain
- Relaxation

To open the skill, just say, "Alexa, open Ambient Soundscapes"
To play specific soundscape, just say, "Alexa, ask Ambient Soundscapes to play Magic Forest"
To get the list of soundscapes, just say, "Alexa, help"

By default, the sound will play until you stop it. To pause the music, say "Alexa, pause.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."

Your candid reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills. Please leave your valuable review on the skill store page.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
